name: Spacetime Inc. FireFly Squadron
description:
To START the game, click on [Start] button on inicial screen!

STORY

The galaxy has passed through a lot since the advancements in space travel tecnology.  Some heroes of the past have achieved victory in the fight against an evil megacorporation that was using spacetime manipulation technology to conquer the galaxy across time.

The technology secrets have been entrusted to some people who were willing to use it for a greater good. So they restructured the megacorporation as the Spacetime Inc., as they trade limited products in the name of civilization advancements.

As balance of the existence has its ways, a race of beings has developed ways of spacetime manipulation as well. But in a natural way, by reaching the deeps of darkness with their own mind skills. They are a race of fire insectoids, and are being sighted bringing fire and destruction across the galaxy and came to be known as Drasect.

As one of the pilots of the FireFly Squadron, you were sent to investigate a Drasect attack on a colony planet. The FireFly Squadron is one of the branches of Spacetime Inc.'s rescue services. They are the firefighters of the galaxy. Their ships have a spacetime portal that instantly brings water from other planets to places where help is needed. As you get closer to other ships, their energies acumulate and make the portals stronger.

GAMEPLAY

The ships of your wingmen carries complementary energy that will help you get stronger when you're close to them. You are STRONGER TOGETHER, so, avoid enemy fire, but don't leave them behind.

CONTROLS

To start the game, click on START button.

WASD - Move ship
[SPACE] - Shoot
